Text: Even if households don't keep buying stocks, there's plenty of proof companies will keep buying back their own shares, with some $820 billion in buybacks announced this year alone, said Harmsworth.
Cause: Even if households don't keep buying stocks
Effect: there's plenty of proof companies will keep buying back their own shares, with some $820 billion in buybacks announced this year alone, said Harmsworth.
